eateries.name: Manndible Café
eateries.about: Manndible Cafe is not your average eatery. There’s something different about this menu: sandwiches with chicken raised around the corner, the perfect cup of coffee roasted that morning down the hill, a fresh organic salad grown across campus, a vegan dessert so rich you’d never guess it had no dairy or eggs, and to finish it off- you can toss your plate and cup into a compost bin instead of a trash can.
